body_html: @hughperkins At the moment, I haven't tried any deep learning library; I'm just doing some scouting to see which library I could potentially use. Have you tried cltorch and DeepCL on Android? I just assumed cltorch did work on Android, since there is an implementation of Torch that is dedicated specifically for Android. And why would you have such an implementation if there already was one that both worked on Android and used OpenCL, right? But maybe I should have known better.

body: @hughperkins At the moment, I haven't tried any deep learning library; I'm just doing some scouting to see which library I could potentially use. Have you tried cltorch and DeepCL on Android? I just assumed cltorch did work on Android, since there is an implementation of Torch that is dedicated specifically for Android. And why would you have such an implementation if there already was one that both worked on Android _and_ used OpenCL, right? But maybe I should have known better.
